name: Chomper (TheKiwiKingdom)
description:
You have entered into a state of mind. Trapped in a procedurally generated maze where you must get the points to win. Do not die to the enemies, nor the traps laid upon the map. This simple game has much to offer, and not everything is as it seems.

Features:
  • Smart AI - AI knows when to run, knows how to see and listen and knows how to capture you.
  • Randomly Procedural Mazes - Never play the same match ever.
  • 3D Spatial Audio - You can locate where the sound is coming from, it will immerse you into the game.
  • Upgrade Store - Earn coins to upgrade your gameplay, your character.
  • Modes/Filters - Just more customisation on game, what you want in a maze, difficulty, post process filters.
  • 2D Version (Coming Soon) - Still WIP, but a 2D Version of the game. 

Multiplayer will only come if there is a massive audience... but I don't think there will be, so it won't be worked on. 

Credits:

Audio is developed by Diego, all of it is owned by him.
The Arcade Model is found here:  https://www.turbosquid.com/3d-models/3d-arcade-machine-1212120 

Discord Server for any questions, or help or bug reports: https://discord.gg/KjJdXcH
